body: The fuck man? That's one hell of a cliffhanger. Worst part is, it probably wont get a continuation anytime soon judging from the comments below. It's a shame honestly, I rarely come across gems like these that gives me the feels and I really enjoy reading them. Like the people below me, I'm going to pretend that the last few pages does not exist.
If oreimo had gone the Yosuga no Sora Route
The worst part is that gay sex is 100x grosser than incest

@namecantbeblonk your argument opened my eyes. Strangely weird that we accept homosexuality where feelings come first, but incase of consensual incest, we look down on it like its murder. Gender comes first, and of course feelings too... Im not saying consensual incest is good, its just how the fuck did gay sex get accepted first. Unbelievable.

They can always get together again after they grow up. Actually, there's a doujin which could be considered a sequel to this series by a different author: https://nhentai.net/g/194265/ (WARNING: this really fucks up kirino's body type).
@dragonloli778 Just a while ago homosexuality is considered a mental illness and now it's an okay thing. But consensual incest is still lead you to prison. Thanks society.
THE LAST PAGES RUINED THE SEQUAL NOW THERES NO MORE PART 5 :(
This really needs a sequel
@反田穀 sus 😳
@masterend i would asume that thier parents were sus about it for a long time
I agree with MasterEnd.

That's the most nonsensical ending ever. "Well, our daughter isn't answering where the used condom came from, so that can ONLY mean she's fucking her brother! It couldn't POSSIBLY be she has a boyfriend, no, it's 100% her brother." I'm just gonna ignore the last pages.

So their parents found a used condom in Kirino's room and automatically assumed (correctly, but without real evidence) she had sex with Kyousuke? Instead of, you know, thinking that it could be a random boyfriend instead? Why were their parents so suspicious?
I will seriously start learning the art style and resume this myself. I don't want it to end like this :(

That shitty Father needs to die, after some research, (scientific stuff here because I got curious i don't have a sister lol) first generation incest has the exact same birth defect and genetic mutation rate as an "normal" pregnancy its only dangerous if it continues, that said, you cannot control who you fall in love with and to that extent im sure they could have still found a way to be together especially once they turn 18 if he isn't already because then, legally  their parents cannot stop them
This so sad, Joe Biden play despacito.
Dang not so wholesome ending there mate
okay ...Im sad now...
UHH WHY??!! :(

Its been 5 years. 5 years since this was released. I've been constantly looking for updates, or any signs of other works from this author. But there is nothing more, and I don't think there will be something else anymore.

I'm giving up, guys. I started reading this series as soon as it was released, and since the release of this chapter, I've been waiting patiently for the next release. But its enough for me, it has been far too long, thanks Fujibayashi Haru for this beautiful series. But as for today, I'll be deleting those last pages from my mind and take this series as finished. Because it already is.
https://nhentai.net/g/113812/ part 3
Dude... Just tell your parents you got a boyfriend at school and he came over when no one else was home... how fucking hard is it? plenty of teenagers do that, lol
We need to delete the last 4 pages
THIS IS THW FIRST TIME A HENTAI MAKES ME THIS FLUSTRATED OVER A ENDING.. MAN THIS SUCKS. THIS SERIES NEEDS A UPDATE OT DELETE THE LAST PAGES FUCK
So this is the true route, and if you read only up to the 2nd one its good ending then.
Hahaha suckass!!!!! Pt. Kirino sucks
Oh FUCK me. i literally CANT fap to this...

I am deeply saddened by the abruptl end of this series; It must continue it has not yet wrapped up the story. I am not sure of what has happened to the author, but I do hope that they will soon finish the doujin because I am very excited to see what will happen next.
Ah... The Bittersweetness
can you delete the last four pages
We need to find a way to delete those last few pages...
please delete last bad pages
I think that 10yrs after doujin is the continuation of this doujin and that doujin has a lot of feels....
Still trying to delete those last pages of sadness out of my soul for the last 2 years
I've been waiting for 4 years? Time heals not the wounds this series has inflicted. We can only dream they get a happy ending, because this is never going to get a sequel. (Hope I'm wrong)
hyuuue... next vol please T^T
hueeee T^T
was it alright that i cried
I wonder what happened to this author...can't just leave me on a sad cliffhanger like that ;-; I really want Volume 5...too sad of an ending to stop here :(
It. Must. Continue...!
The saddness
This is how doujinshi should be done. I hope it continues...
Better ending than the anime
is this end? :(
so sweat to fap.
